data.text: @WoodyAllenPages I'm torn. Irrational Man looks sort of goofy but I like it but I quite like the Magic in the Moonlight one. Cafe Society not so much.

@WoodyAllenPages Saul Bass is one of my favourites (there’s a great huge book of his work), and there are some other ‘brand names’ but very uk and us focused. It’s the smaller hidden over sea gems I want to uncover!
@alanjtait They need a union. I love film posters. I reckon there’s a doco about film poster designers, there’s probably legends in the scene whose stories are amazing.
@WoodyAllenPages Perhaps designers should start to sign their work like artists (...opening a can of worms here...) 😊
@AllenLynching There’s an article on the site. They have some displays around town. I’m sure there are flyers and things...
@alanjtait I know. What’s crazy is poster designers never get credit.
@AllenLynching 23rd June, but I think there are some advanced screenings here and there!
@WoodyAllenPages Just look at that Magic In the Moonlight poster!! Stunning.
